text: Nusrat Bhutto Colony () is a neighborhood in the Karachi Central district of Karachi, Pakistan.North Nazimabad Town - Government of Karachi There are several ethnic groups in Nusrat Bhutto Colony including Muhajirs, Sindhis, Kashmiris, Seraikis, Pakhtuns, Balochis, Memons, Bohras, Ismailis, etc. Over 99% of the population is Muslim. The population of North Nazimabad Town is estimated to be nearly one million. The majority of population in Nusrat Bhutto Colony are Pakhtuns. ==References== == External links == * Karachi Website Category:Neighbourhoods of Karachi Category:North Nazimabad Town
title: Nusrat Bhutto Colony
